dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Ilya Sutskever
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image classification, containing millions of labeled images across thousands of categories, used to broaden the vocabulary of the point-cloud detector.
dcterms:title: ImageNet1K

dcterms:creator: Shuran Song
Samuel P Lichtenberg
Jianxiong Xiao
dcterms:description: A benchmark suite for RGB-D scene understanding, providing rich annotations for indoor scenes, used for evaluating the performance of 3D detection methods.
dcterms:title: SUN RGB-D

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X. Chang
Manolis Savva
Maciej Halber
Thomas Funkhouser
Matthias Nießner
dcterms:description: A dataset providing richly annotated 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, used for training and evaluating 3D object detection models.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:creator: Xingyi Zhou
Rohit Girdhar
Armand Joulin
Phillip Krähenbühl
Ishan Misra
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image classification with 21,000 classes, used to enhance the capabilities of image detectors.
dcterms:title: ImageNet21K

dcterms:description: A dataset for 3D object classification, often used in conjunction with other datasets for training and evaluating models.
dcterms:title: ModelNet
